description: This file defines a mock class 'libUSBImplMock' for the libusb API, used for unit testing interactions with libusb in C++ applications. It includes default behaviors for various libusb functions via Google Mock, facilitating controlled testing scenarios.

classes.name: libUSBImplMock
classes.description: A mock class implementing libusb API functions for testing purposes, derived from 'libusbApiImpl'. It sets up default return values for libusb functions using Google Mock.

methods.name: libusb_init_context
methods.description: Mocked method for initializing libusb context with default return value LIBUSB_SUCCESS.

methods.name: libusb_has_capability
methods.description: Mocked method for checking libusb capability, defaults to returning 1.

methods.name: libusb_hotplug_register_callback
methods.description: Mocked method for registering hotplug callback, defaults to LIBUSB_SUCCESS.

methods.name: libusb_get_device_descriptor
methods.description: Mocked method for retrieving device descriptor, defaults to LIBUSB_SUCCESS.

methods.name: libusb_strerror
methods.description: Mocked method for retrieving error string, defaults to 'Other error'.

methods.name: libusb_open
methods.description: Mocked method for opening a device, defaults to LIBUSB_SUCCESS.

methods.name: libusb_get_device_list
methods.description: Mocked method for obtaining device list, defaults to 0.

methods.name: libusb_kernel_driver_active
methods.description: Mocked method for checking kernel driver, defaults to LIBUSB_SUCCESS.

methods.name: libusb_attach_kernel_driver
methods.description: Mocked method for attaching kernel driver, defaults to LIBUSB_SUCCESS.

methods.name: libusb_detach_kernel_driver
methods.description: Mocked method for detaching kernel driver, defaults to LIBUSB_SUCCESS.

methods.name: libusb_get_config_descriptor
methods.description: Mocked method for getting configuration descriptor, defaults to LIBUSB_SUCCESS.

methods.name: libusb_get_device_speed
methods.description: Mocked method returning device speed 3 (high speed).
